alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Johns and northeastern Clay Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Doctors Inlet, or near Orange Park, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Middleburg, Fruit Cove, Fleming Island, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside, Switzerland, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace and Asbury Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay
